mobs.long_desc: A small brown rabbit hops across to a nice patch of clover.
mobs.desc: This small brown rabbit has long ears and hind feet. Her gentle brown eyes regard the world with a vaguely puzzled and alarmed expression.

mobs.long_desc: A brown fox is here, looking for some rabbits to chew up.
mobs.desc: It is a large fox with beautiful red-brown fur and a long thick brush.

mobs.long_desc: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
mobs.desc: She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.

mobs.long_desc: A small brownie is standing here, looking mischievous.
mobs.desc: He is about a foot tall, and that little twinkle in his eye tells you that SOMETHING is up. You've probably caught him in the middle of one of his mischievous little plots..

mobs.keywords: galithel silverwing ranger master lord teacher guildmaster
mobs.long_desc: A nimble ranger stands among the trees stringing his bow.
mobs.desc: The heavy cloak hides most of the features of this large man.  Galithel Silverwing has battled with many demons and gods to protect the forests of Mielikki.  For his centuries of service he has been made ranger lord.

mobs.long_desc: A stout dwarf roams the countryside.
mobs.desc: This stout fellow seems to be investigating the Grey White Mountains, but what he is looking for is a mystery.

mobs.long_desc: A song sparrow flits from branch to branch.
mobs.desc: He's a little yellow bird with pretty plumage and a perky expression, and every chance he gets, he bursts into beautiful song.
It's a large bird, with glossy black feathers and knowing yellow eyes.

mobs.long_desc: A little furry hedgehog scampers past.
mobs.desc: It's a little four-footed creature, similar in shape to a rodent, but with spikier fur.  It chitters alarmedly when it sees people nearby, but otherwise just scampers around looking for food.

mobs.long_desc: A brown mouse tries to hide.
mobs.desc: She's a delicate little brown mouse with bright eyes and soft whiskers.  Her nose twitches constantly and her tail thrashes the air as she tries to hide herself away.

mobs.keywords: ranger guard guildguard ranger woman elven half
mobs.long_desc: A half-elven woman in ranger's garb stands near the west end of the path.
mobs.desc: She is tall and haughty, with copper-colored ringlets of hair flowing down her back and sage-green eyes that are slightly slanted.  She has a faintly disapproving air as she looks around, her weapons at the ready.

objects.ground: A cute yellow feather is drifting around here.

extras.text: Aww, it's a cute little wing feather from a song sparrow.  It looks delicate, but could probably be used as a quill to scribe with in a pinch.

triggers.name: Spirit scales stop decaying when taken
triggers.commands: say My trigger commandlist is not complete!

triggers.name: Spirit scaled decay again when dropped
triggers.commands: say My trigger commandlist is not complete!

triggers.name: tattle_tail_guard_killer
triggers.commands: mforce %actor.name% bug I HAVE KILLED A GUILD GUARD IN THIS ROOM!  TELL TANLE IMMEDIATELY IF YOU SEE THIS BUG REPORT.

rooms.name: Field Path Intersection
rooms.description: You are standing just east of the East Gate on a four-way intersection in the middle of a lush green field.  The chatter of the wildlife comes from all directions.  They sound awfully cute, don't they?

North.description: You see the Northern Field Path.

East.description: You see the Small Path through the Fields.

South.description: You see the Southern Field Path.

West.description: You see the outside of the town's Eastern Gate.

rooms.name: Beginning of the Northern Field Path
rooms.description: You are standing in the beginning of the Northern Field Path.  It appears to be a relatively short path, ending at a strange citadel just northeast of here. You can return to the Small Field Path to the south, or continue down the Northern Field Path to the north.

North.description: You see a turn in the Northern Field path.

South.description: You see the Field Path intersection.

rooms.name: Southern Field Path
rooms.description: You are standing on a path running through lush green fields.  The Southern Field Path ends at an intersection to the north as well as continuing on to the south.  To the east is a large clearing.

North.description: You see the Field Path intersection.

East.description: You see a field clearing.

South.description: You see the Southern Field Path.

rooms.name: Small Path through the Fields
rooms.description: You are standing on an east-west path through lush green fields.  The sounds of furry wildlife surround you.  There is a four-way intersection in the path to the west and the path continues on to the east.

East.description: You see the Small Path through the fields.

West.description: You see the Field Path intersection.

rooms.name: Small Path through the Fields
rooms.description: You are standing on an east-west path through lush green fields.  The path continues on to the west.  To the east is an intersection in the path and the outskirts of a light forested area.

East.description: You see the Light Forest Trail intersection.

West.description: You see the Small Path through the fields.

rooms.name: Light Forest Trail Intersection
rooms.description: You are standing just inside a light forest on an east-west path.  The forest ends to the west, giving way to lush green fields.  The small path descends sharply to the east, passing through what looks to be burnt undergrowth.  To the south, a trail runs deeper into the forest.

East.description: You see a burnt path through the undergrowth.

South.description: You see the Light Forest Trail.

West.description: You see the Small Path through the fields.

rooms.name: Burnt Path through the Undergrowth
rooms.description: You are standing on a downward sloping path that appears to have been rather crudely burned through the light forest undergrowth.  An underground passage begins just east of here, or you can head above-ground by going west.

East.description: You see mists rising out of an underground passage.

West.description: You see the Light Forest Trail intersection.

rooms.name: Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing at the beginning of a path through some light forest.  The trail continues on to the south.  To the north, this trail intersects with the small field path.  The sounds of small animals at play surround you.  They really do sound awfully cute..  Really!

North.description: You see the Light Forest Trail intersection.

South.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: The Light Forest Trail runs north and south from here.  The light forest ends a short ways north of here and gets denser to the south.  You can't help but appreciate the serenity surrounding you.

North.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

South.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing at a T-crossing in the Light Forest Trail here.  The Light Forest Trail itself continues on to the north and south from here.  To the west, you see another path running through a darker forested area.

North.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

South.description: You see a turn in the Light Forest trail.

West.description: You see a path through the Dark Forest.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: The Light Forest Trail turns here, continuing on to the north and east. The forest thickens significantly to the south, and looks to be completely impassable to the west.  The trees seem to be larger to the south as well.

North.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

East.description: You see an intersection in the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: Dark Forest Path
rooms.description: You are standing at the end of a path running through a dark forested area. The path continues on to the west and ends here, intersecting with a trail running through the lighter forested area to the east.

East.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

West.description: You see a turn in a path running through the Dark Forest.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Dark Forest Path
rooms.description: You are standing in a turn in a path running through a dark forested area. The path continues on to the east and south from here.  There is noticably less wildlife in this area, making it rather ominous.

East.description: You see the end of the path running through the Dark Forest.

South.description: You see a path running through the Dark Forest.

rooms.name: Dark Forest Path
rooms.description: You are standing on a path through a dark forested area.  This path ends just to the north, as well as continuing on to the south.  The forest here is dark and seems to be slightly more dangerous than most of the other areas you have seen in this forest.

North.description: You see a turn in the path running through the Dark Forest.

South.description: You see a path running through the Dark Forest.

rooms.name: Dark Forest Path
rooms.description: You are standing on a path in a dark forested area.  The path ends just south of here, as well as continuing on to the north.  To the west, you can see the end of the Southern Field Path.  The path to the south looks especially dangerous.  The Southern Field Path looks to be the safe bet.

North.description: You see a path running through the Dark Forest.

South.description: You see the end of the path running through the Dark Forest.

West.description: You see the end of the Southern Field path.

rooms.name: Dark Forest Path
rooms.description: You are standing on a path at the edge of a dark forested area.  South of here you can see the outskirts of the Twisted Forest.  The path also continues on to the north, though the dark forest.

North.description: You see a path running through the Dark Forest.

South.description: You see the outskirts of the Twisted Forest.

rooms.name: Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing on an east to west running section of the Light Forest Trail.  There is a turn in the trail to the west of here.  The trail also continues on to the east as well.  To the south, there is another trail into deeper parts of the forest.

East.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

South.description: You see a trail through the Deep Forest.

West.description: You see a bend in the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing on the Light Forest Trail.  The trail is running east to west here.  Tracks from all sorts of common forest creatures can be seen along this part of the trail.

East.description: You see a turn in the Light Forest trail.

West.description: You see an intersection in the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: A T-crossing in the Deep Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing at a t-crossing in the Deep Forest.  The trail continues on through the Deep Forest itself to the south and west from this area.  To the north, you can leave the Deep Forest by making your way out on to the Light Forest Trail.  The mighty trees of the Deep Forest seem to be even larger to the south of this spot.

North.description: You see an intersection with the Light Forest trail.

South.description: You see a turn in the trail through the Deep Forest.

West.description: You see a turn in the trail through the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These trees are simply huge. Some of them look to be at LEAST twenty feet in diameter, and are probably several centuries old.

rooms.name: Southern Field Path
rooms.description: You are standing on a path running through lush green fields.  The Southern Field Path runs north and south from here.  The woods to the west are very dense but it looks as though you can squeeze through in this place.  There is also a large clearing to the east.

North.description: You see the Southern Field path.

East.description: You see a field clearing.

South.description: You see the Southern Field path.

rooms.name: Southern Field Path
rooms.description: You are still on the Southern Field Path, which continues on to the north and south from here.  The sounds of wildlife surround you here.

North.description: You see the Southern Field path.

South.description: You see the Southern Field path.

rooms.name: Southern Field Path
rooms.description: From here, you can see the end of the Southern Field Path to the south. The Southern Field Path continues on to the north as well.  From every direction emanate the sounds of wildlife.

North.description: You see the Southern Field path.

South.description: You see the end of the Southern Field path.

rooms.name: The End of the Southern Field Path
rooms.description: The Southern Field Path ends here.  The path extends to the north, or one can make one's way to the dark forest path that lies just eastward.  The forest itself grows more quiet and eerie to the south, with twisting shadows making the ground almost black at all hours.

North.description: You see the Southern Field path.

East.description: You see a path running through the Dark Forest.

rooms.name: Field Clearing (NW)
rooms.description: You are standing in the northwest corner of a large clearing in the fields. This area looks rather well travelled, but not by creatures you're used to seeing.  The field clearing continues on to the south and east.  To the west is the Southern Field Path.

East.description: You see a field clearing.

South.description: You see a field clearing.

West.description: You see the Southern Field path.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing at a turn in the Light Forest Trail.  From here, the trail continues on to the west and south.  The path looks to be rather lightly travelled, but not all of the tracks here are recognizable.

South.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

West.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: The Light Forest Path runs to the north and south from here.  The forest definately looks to be thicker to the west of here.  This trail, however, seems to be skirting around the edge of the denser forest for now.

North.description: You see a turn in the Light Forest trail.

South.description: You see a turn in the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: Another Turn in the Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing in yet another turn in the Light Forest Trail, as it carefully avoids entering the deep forest to the south and west of here.  The Light Forest Trail continues on to the north and east from this spot.

North.description: You see the Light Forest trail.

East.description: You see another turn in the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing at another turn in the Light Forest Trail.  There is yet another turn in the trail just west of here, and the trail ends a little ways to the south of this area.

South.description: You see the end of the Light Forest trail.

West.description: You see another turn in the Light Forest trail.

rooms.name: The End of the Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: The Light Forest Trail ends here.  From here, you can either follow the Light Forest Trail north, or you can enter the Deep Forest to the west.

North.description: You see a turn in the Light Forest trail.

West.description: You see a trail through the Deep Forest.

rooms.name: A T-crossing on the Deep Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing at a T-crossing in the Deep Forest.  The trail through the Deep Forest continues on to the west, as well as continuing deeper into the Deep Forest to the south.  You can also leave the Deep Forest entirely by heading east from this spot.  The trees in this area are huge.  Some of them look to be hundreds of years old, at least!

East.description: You see the end of the Light Forest trail.

South.description: You see the Deep Forest.

West.description: You see a turn in the trail through the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These trees are simply huge. Some of them look to be at LEAST twenty feet in diameter, and are probably several centuries old.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Deep Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in the trail through the Deep Forest.  The trail itself continues on to the north and east from here.  The trees are quite large around here..  Very impressive indeed.

North.description: You see a turn in the trail through the Deep Forest.

East.description: You see a t-crossing in the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These trees are simply huge. Some of them look to be at LEAST twenty feet in diameter, and are probably several centuries old.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Deep Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing in yet another turn in the twisty path through the Deep Forest.  The trail continues on to the south and west from here.  The trees tower above you here, blocking out all light from the sky.

South.description: You see another bend in the Deep Forest trail.

West.description: You see another bend in the Deep Forest trail.

extras.text: These trees are simply huge. Some of them look to be at LEAST twenty feet in diameter, and are probably several centuries old.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Deep Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in the trail through the Deep Forest.  The trail continues on to the north and east from this spot, winding its way through the majestic trees of the Deep Forest.

North.description: You see a t-crossing in the Deep Forest.

East.description: You see another turn in the deep forest trail.

extras.text: These trees are simply huge. Some of them look to be at LEAST twenty feet in diameter, and are probably several centuries old.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Deep Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing on a trail through the Deep Forest.  The Deep Forest becomes impassable to the west, but the trail continues on to the east and south from this spot.  The trees to the west look timeless, as if they have been here since the beginning of time.

East.description: You see a t-crossing in the Deep Forest.

South.description: You see a trail through the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These trees are simply huge. Some of them look to be at LEAST twenty feet in diameter, and are probably several centuries old.

rooms.name: Deep Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing on a north to south running section of the trail that runs through the Deep Forest.  You can head even deeper into the mighty trees of the Deep Forest to the south, or you can follow the path north.  The trees definately seem to be getting larger to the south.

North.description: You see a bend in the trail through the Deep Forest.

South.description: You see a trail through the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These trees are simply huge. Some of them look to be at LEAST twenty feet in diameter, and are probably several centuries old.

rooms.name: Deep Forest Trail
rooms.description: You are standing on a north to south running section of a trail running through the majestic Deep Forest.  You can head deep into the Deep Forest to the south, or you can head into less dense sections of the forest by heading north from this spot.  The trees here, majestic as they are, are even larger to the south, unbelievable as that may seem!

North.description: You see a trail through the Deep Forest.

South.description: You see the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These trees are simply huge. Some of them look to be at LEAST twenty feet in diameter, and are probably several centuries old.

rooms.name: Deep Inside the Deep Forest
rooms.description: You are now deep inside the Deep Forest.  The trees here are simply the most impressive works of nature you have ever seen before.  You can leave this section of the Deep Forest to the north, or head even deeper into the forest to the east.

North.description: You see a trail through the Deep Forest.

East.description: You see the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These tress are simply beyond belief! You don't see a tree in this area that is less than 30 feet in diameter, and SOME of them look to be as much as 50 feet across! Some of these trees must be a thousand years old, possibly even thousands. Very impressive, indeed!

rooms.name: Deep Inside the Deep Forest
rooms.description: You are now about as deep inside the Deep Forest as you could ever get. The trees here are awe inspiring, a true tribute to the Goddess of Nature, Mielikki.  These trees, some of them as wide as 50 feet across, completely block out the sky, which seems to create a sense of timelessness here, somewhere deep inside the Deep Forest.  You can head for less dense areas of the Deep Forest to the west, or journey further into the Deep Forest by heading out to the east from here.

East.description: You see the Deep Forest.

West.description: You see the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These tress are simply beyond belief! You don't see a tree in this area that is less than 30 feet in diameter, and SOME of them look to be as much as 50 feet across! Some of these trees must be a thousand years old, possibly even thousands. Very impressive, indeed!

rooms.name: Deep Inside the Deep Forest
rooms.description: You are now deep inside the Deep Forest.  The trees here are absolutely fabulous.  Mielikki, the Goddess of Nature, has truly outdone herself!  You can leave this section of the Deep Forest to the north, or you can head even deeper into the Deep Forest by heading west from here.

North.description: You see a t-crossing in the Deep Forest.

East.description: You see a narrow trail.

West.description: You see the Deep Forest.

extras.text: These tress are simply beyond belief! You don't see a tree in this area that is less than 30 feet in diameter, and SOME of them look to be as much as 50 feet across! Some of these trees must be a thousand years old, possibly even thousands. Very impressive, indeed!

rooms.name: Deep Inside the Deep Forest
rooms.description: You are now about as deep inside the Deep Forest as you could possibly get. The trees here are awe inspiring, a true tribute to the powers of Mielikki, the Goddess of Nature.  The trees, some of them as wide as 50 feet across, completely block out the sky, which seems to create a sense of timelessness here, deep inside the Deep Forest.  You can continue on in the deepest parts of the Deep Forest to the west, or you can make your way to less dense sections of the forest by heading east from here.

East.description: You see the Deep Forest.

West.description: You see the Deep Forest.

extras.text: The oak appears to have a door built right into it.

These tress are simply beyond belief! You don't see a tree in this area that is less than 30 feet in diameter, and SOME of them look to be as much as 50 feet across! Some of these trees must be a thousand years old, possibly even thousands. Very impressive, indeed! And in particular, one tree, a mighty oak, stands a little apart from all the rest.

rooms.name: Field Clearing (NE)
rooms.description: You are standing in the northeast corner of a large field clearing.  The field clearing continues on to the south and west.  From here, you can just barely see the Southern Field Path in the distance to the west.

South.description: You see a field clearing.

West.description: You see a field clearing.

rooms.name: Field Clearing (SE)
rooms.description: You are standing in the southeast corner of a large field clearing.  The field clearing continues on to the north and west.  From here, you can just barely see the Southern Field Path in the distance to the west.

North.description: You see a field clearing.

West.description: You see a field clearing.

rooms.name: Field Clearing (SW)
rooms.description: You are standing in the southwest corner of a large clearing in the fields. It looks like many strange creatures frequent the area, but you're not familiar with their tracks.  The field clearing continues on to the north and east.  To the west is the Southern Field Path.

North.description: You see a field clearing.

East.description: You see a field clearing.

West.description: You see the Southern Field path.

rooms.name: Turn in the Northern Field Path
rooms.description: You are standing on the Northern Field Path.  From here, the Citadel is just east and slightly north of here.  You can continue on towards the Citadel to the east, or head back for the Small Field Path to the south.

East.description: You see the Northern Field path.

South.description: You see the beginning of the Northern Field path.

rooms.name: Northern Field Path
rooms.description: The Northern Field path continues on here, going to the east and west of this spot.  The strange citadel is a small distance to the east, or you can make your way back to the Small Field Path to the west.

East.description: You see the Northern Field path.

West.description: You see a turn in the Northern Field path.

rooms.name: Northern Field Path
rooms.description: You are standing on the Northern Field Path.  The mysterious citadel is northeast of here; you can reach it by following the path to the east.  You can also follow the path away from the citadel to the west.

East.description: You see a bend in the Northern Field path.

West.description: You see the Northern Field path.

rooms.name: Bend in the Northern Field Path
rooms.description: You are standing in a bend in the Northern Field Path.  From here, the mysterious citadel is directly north of you.  If you do not wish to head for the citadel, you can also follow the path westwards.  The forest becomes more dense to the east and the hills rise behind the trees a few miles back.  A light trail starts through the forest to the east.

North.description: You see the end of the Northern Field path.

West.description: You see the Northern Field path.

rooms.name: End of the Northern Field Path
rooms.description: You are standing at the end of the Northern Field Path, just outside a mysterious looking citadel.  Although there are still the sounds of many small animals nearby, there seem to be many fewer of them in this area.  You can enter the citadel to the north, or you can head back down the Northern Field Path to the south.

North.description: You see the entrance to the mysterious citadel.

South.description: You see a bend in the Northern Field path.

rooms.name: A Narrow Forest Path
rooms.description: The path from the main fields is difficult to pass as the dense green vegetation seems to pull from all directions.  There is less light here as the deep canopy of trees hides the sky from sight.  Lush ferns and large mushrooms grow on the forest floor.

rooms.name: Grounds of Silverwing
rooms.description: The trees part to envelop a small circular clearing with a small bit of sunlight in the center.  There are small targets scattered about riddled with arrows.  A simple shelter is built into the trees and the giggling of pixies can be heard in the treetops.

rooms.name: A Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: This part of the trail seems lighter than normal although there are deep ruts in the trail as though something heavy has been drug through the area regularly.  There are some large grey white boulders scattered about through the trees that look like they have been dumped there.  The path continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: A Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: This part of the trail is well worn and ruts are everywhere as though this is a common place for large wagons to converge.  There are many large grey white boulders scattered about through the trees along with many more smaller rocks of all kinds that look to have been dumped there.  The path continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: A Light Forest Trail
rooms.description: The trail slowly slopes upward and the trees begin to thin out as the ground hardens into rock in places.  The hills to the west are plainly visible and the dense forest trails back down to the east.  Large rocks lay scattered to the side of the trail as though they have freed themselves from the slopes above somehow.

rooms.name: A Worn Rut in the Foothills
rooms.description: The grade of the trail is quite steep but manageable.  There are very few trees here as they attempt to cling to life in the bit of soil between large rock formations.  There are large scars in the rock face of the trail that indicate its direction.  The trail continues down into the woods or eastward into the mountains.

rooms.name: A Worn Rut in the Foothills
rooms.description: The grade of the trail is quite steep but manageable.  There are very few trees here as they attempt to cling to life in the bit of soil between large rock formations.  There are large scars in the rock face of the trail that indicate its direction.  The trail continues west to the woods or eastward into the mountains.

rooms.name: A Cut Section in the Foothills
rooms.description: The grade of the road is better than before as you step by the wagons and tools of workers who seem to be flattening the trail by cutting out long switchbacks in the rockface that slowly climb through the foothills to the top of the ridges above you.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Road
rooms.description: The elevation change through this section of road is dramatic.  To the west a town is smartly centered in some fields among the dense forest.  Far far to the north a hazy set of snow capped mountains can be seen just barely on the horizon.  At this altitude they must be hundreds of miles away.  A similar set of black mountains can be seen to the west.  An orange haze of dust appears to be blowing over them.

rooms.name: High in the Grey White Mountains
rooms.description: The grade of the road doesn't seem to change quite as much anymore as this looks to be in the higher parts of this ridgeline.  The road rolls in and out of rock formations and it's noticeably cooler here than at the lower elevations.

rooms.name: High in the Grey White Mountains
rooms.description: The grade of the road doesn't seem to change quite as much anymore as this looks to be in the higher parts of this ridgeline.  The road rolls in and out of rock formations and it's noticeably cooler here than at the lower elevations.  The road contines into the mountains to the west and switches steeply downward to the north.

rooms.name: A Steep Climb
rooms.description: This part of the road is a long series of very steep switchbacks.  The ridge to the north is a long climb upward and the base of these mountains can be seen down to the north a ways.  The air is cool and salty.

rooms.name: Among the Grey White Mountains
rooms.description: The slope of the hills is easy to traverse and the trail rises into the mountains above.  Lush green vegitation covers the rocks and the soil here supports many small bushes and shrubs.  The trail continues to climb into the mountains above and slopes downward to the east.  The ocean can be seen to the east as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: Tree Covered Hills
rooms.description: As the trail leads up from the cliffs above the ocean, the soil begins to bear a grove of trees that seems to be worn by the mountainous coastline like a green belt of leaves.  The entire grove seems only 100 feet wide as the trail cuts down through it.  The view of what is directly below is blocked.

rooms.name: Rolling Through the Trees
rooms.description: The forest is dense and the trail snakes though the trees, avoiding rock formations. The path climbs through the trees to the south and continues up over a rock above. The dense green vegetation mixes well with the salty air of the ocean.

rooms.name: Rolling Through the Trees
rooms.description: The forest is dense and the trail snakes though the trees, avoiding rock formations. The dense green vegetation mixes well with the salty air of the ocean. The trail winds through the trees and disappears over a rock below, continuing through the trees and rock formations northward.

rooms.name: Rolling Through the Trees
rooms.description: The forest is dense and the trail snakes though the trees avoiding rock formations.  Sloping to the east the ocean can be seen clearly.  The trees grow denser as the trail snakes into the forest southward.

rooms.name: Grey Spray Road
rooms.description: The road is amazingly smooth but very well worn.  Large scars appear on the road as if many centuries of wagon travel have worn it down.  The air is filled with a humidity that almost wets the skin.  The ocean can be seen behind the road as it extends to the east.  The road tails off into a trail which splits, leading north into the foothills or west into the forest.

rooms.name: Grey Spray Road
rooms.description: The road is amazingly smooth but very well worn.  Large scars appear on the road as if many centuries of wagon travel have worn it down.  The air is filled with a humidity that almost wets the skin.  The road continues to the south and west.

rooms.name: Grey Spray Road
rooms.description: The road is amazingly smooth but very well worn.  Large scars appear on the road as if many centuries of wagon travel have worn it down.  The air is filled with a humidity that almost wets the skin.  The road continues to the north and east.

rooms.name: Grey Spray Road
rooms.description: The road is amazingly smooth but very well worn.  Large scars appear on the road, as if many centuries of wagon travel have worn it down.  The air is filled with a humidity that almost wets the skin.  The road continues to the north and east.  A road cuts off to the north from here leading to a an old, formal-looking building, perhaps a monastery.  The smell of the sea is very strong here; the road is high up enough on a cliff that the water is visible far below stretching as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: Grey Spray Road
rooms.description: The road is amazingly smooth but very well worn.  Large scars appear on the road as if many centuries of wagon travel have worn it down.  The air is filled with a humidity that almost wets the skin.  Hundreds of feet below, the calming sound of waves hitting sand and rock echoes upwards.  Mysteriously, the well-worn road seems to dead-end here, but a slightly overgrown path splits off to the north.

rooms.name: path
rooms.description: Here it cuts away from the sea and back into the mountains as the top of the coast line slowly goes down in elevation to the south along the ocean

rooms.name: Mountains
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.

rooms.name: Edge of Foothills
rooms.description: From there the grey rock path leaves the foothills and enters a range of snow capped mountains.  Continuing up into these mountains could be a very difficult journey.  Directly east of here lies you can make out the flickering lights of a distant village, and westward lies a row of forbidding black peaks. Far to the south you can see that it leads down out of the foothills.  The path runs north and up from here.

rooms.name: Grey Rock Path
rooms.description: You are on a grey rock path that winds through the wooded foothills. Further north you see the trail enters the mountains.  At that point the path look difficult to traverse.  The ice caps stare down at you almost daring you to attempt passage through this barren land.  A ways east you can make out the flickering lights of a distant village, and westward lies a row of forbidding black peaks.  A ways south you see the trail you are on leads down out of the foothills.  The path runs south and west from here.

rooms.name: Grey Rock Path
rooms.description: You are on a grey rock path that winds through the wooded foothills. Further north you see the trail snaking up into the hills through a series of switchbacks.  Beyond that lies a range of snow capped mountains rising above the tops of the hills.  Off to the north east you faintly see the flickering lights of a distant village.  To the west you can barely make out a range of forbiding black mountains whose caps are lost in the clouds.  Further south you see the trail leads down out of these foothills.  The path runs north and west from here.

rooms.name: Grey Rock Path
rooms.description: You are on a grey rock path that winds through the wooded foothills. Further north you see the trail snaking up into the hills through a series of switchbacks.  Beyond that lies a range of snow capped mountains rising above the tops of the hills.  Off to the north east you faintly see the flickering lights of a distant village.  To the west you can barely make out a range of forbiding black mountains whose caps are lost in the clouds.  Further south you see the trail leads down out of these foothills.  The path runs north and west from here.

rooms.name: Grey Rock Path
rooms.description: You are on a grey rock path that winds through the wooded foothills. Further north you see the trail snaking up into the hills through a series of switchbacks.  Beyond that lies a range of snow capped mountains rising above the tops of the hills.  Off to the north east you faintly see the flickering lights of a distant village.  To the west you can barely make out a range of forbiding black mountains whose caps are lost in the clouds.  Looking south along the trail you see that it leads down out of these foothills and into much easier terrain.  The trail runs east and down from here.

rooms.name: Edge of the foothills
rooms.description: You are standing on a path at the edge of some wooded foothills.  Looking north you see the path you are on snaking up into the hills through a series of switchbacks.  Further to the north you can see a range of snow capped mountains knifing up into the clouds.  As you trace the line of the hills to the north east you can faintly see the flickering lights of some distant village. Looking west youcan barely make out a range of forbiding black mountains whose caps are lost in the clouds.  You are sure that peaks that tall would be capped with snow, ice and fierce winds.  Crossing them would be a treacherous journey indeed.  If you follow the path to the south you enter some soft rolling hills that are beautiful and richly covered with foliage.  The soft inviting roar of a waterfall drifts in from somewhere south of your position.  The trail runs up and south from here.

rooms.name: A Small Side Path
rooms.description: The path leads through a slightly grassy area on the flat clifftop.  The crashing of waves can be heard to the east and the green sea stretches out to the horizon.  The well worn road lies to the south.  An old well made building seems to lie to the north.

rooms.name: Before an Old Monastery
rooms.description: The path leads though a slightly grassy area on the flat clifftop.  The crashing of waves can be heard to the east and the green sea stretches out to the horizon.  The path leads back against the hills slightly so the monastery is protected on three sides by the high, sheer limestone cliffs.  The building is modestly constructed, carved in part from the rock itself, looks very old and unchanged except for what appears to be a new solid door of metal and wood.

North.description: The heavy wooden door is new looking and very sturdily made. It's bordered with metal reinforcements and accoutrements. There is a carving in the center of the door.

extras.text: The carving is a circle composed of five circles linked together. In the center of the five circles is carved the guild icon.
The heavy wooden door is new looking and very sturdily made. It's bordered with metal reinforcements and accoutrements. There is a carving in the center of the door.
